message.body: Neutral milk hotel is playing at the Mann center tonight. Wanna go? Also NIN/Soundgarden is playing wed the 30th.
Yes I wanna go! Are there stil tix??
Which show? Nmh or soundgarden/nin? or both? I think tix are available for both.
Both! I'll text you after work tonight and let you know about nmh!
I'm feeling a little not great today. I think I have to pass on the NMH show, unless u bought tix already. Let's figure out soundgarden/nin later this week.
Ohh! I was still debating. I saw them in NJ and NY already and it was amazing. Thinking I might pass to and save up for NIN!
Feel better dude. Save up energy for our 90s alt rock adventure!
Thanks! I saw nmh in the fall. Amazing. If I didn't feel awful and have to steadicam tomorrow for Christian I'd definitely go. Can't wait for the 90s!
Man they are touring a lot!! We can go next time:) good luck on set tmw!!
